item.description:
A card game for 2+ players based on the video game Heroes of Might & Magic III.

Players compete in 3 categories: Might, Magic and Gold. Most cards increase your score in one of these 3 categories. At the end of the game, the player with the highest score in the most categories is the winner.

There are seven Decks:
• Hero Deck - Heroes are of 2 types: Might Heroes and Magic Heroes. Each Hero also belongs to 1 of the 8 town types. Each player starts with 1 randomly drawn Hero. 
• Build Deck - These are building located in towns within your Kingdom. Some indicate affiliation with 1 of the 8 town types. Your kingdom may contain multiple Town Affiliations. 
• Explore Deck - Locations, Structures, and items found within your Kingdom, but outside of your towns. 
• Creature Deck - Each creature belongs to 1 of the 8 town types. 
• Spell Deck - Spells belong to 1 of 4 types: Air, Earth, Fire, and Water. 
• Skill Deck - Advanced Knowledge known to your Heroes. 
• Artefact Deck - Magical Objects of great Power. 
Cards may have attributes as follows: Ranged, Defence, Quick, Burst, Incapacitate, Reinforce, Buff

All cards owned and controlled by a player are placed face up on the table in front of them. This is each player’s Kingdom.

Players take turns with each turn comprising 4 Phases: 
1. Build Phase - Draw 1 Card from the Build Deck and add it to your Kingdom. 
2. Creature Phase - Draw 1 Card from the Creature Deck and add it to your Kingdom. 
3. Recruit Phase - Roll once on the recruit table and draw 1 card from the Hero, Skill, Spell or Artefact deck, dependant on the die roll.
4. Explore Phase - Draw 1 Card from the Explore Deck and add it to your Kingdom.

The game ends when every player has completed 7 turns.

The player with the most Ranged cards gets Might +5 and Magic +5. 
The player with the most Defence cards gets Might +5 and Magic +5. 
The player with the most Quick cards gets Might +5 and Magic +5. 
The player with the most Incapacitate cards gets Might +5 and Magic +5. 
The player with the most Burst cards gets Might +5 and Magic +5. 
The player with the most Reinforce cards gets Might +5 and Magic +5. 
The player with the most Buff cards gets Might +5 and Magic +5.

At the end of the game, the player with the highest score in the most categories (Might, Magic and Gold) is the winner.
